Projects

Undergraduate Thesis

Title: Task Offloading Exploiting Grey Wolf Optimization in Collaborative Edge Computing

Undergraduate Thesis, 2021

Description:

An efficient task offloading framework is proposed, namely WOLVERINE, that brings about a collaboration among the edge servers to share computational resources while penetrating real-time applications in edge devices with optimal resource cost, time and energy consumption.

Domain: Computer networking

Supervisor: Dr. Md. Abdur Razzaque, Professor & Chairman, University of Dhaka


Academic Projects (Undergraduate)

3D Graph Plotter
Web Development Project, 2020

A desktop software which can visualize multiple complex graphs in the same space and can analyze their natures. JavaFX was used to build it.

  • Language(s): Python, HTML, CSS, JS
  • Technology(s): Django

Qair
Mobile App Development, 2019

An android project to implement an online exam platform where MCQ exams can be held, graded and ranked automatically.

  • Language(s): Java, CSS

Babysitter
Adruino Hardware Project, 2019

An arduino project which detects the sound of a baby crying and creates a soothing environment in the room to calm down the baby.

  • Language(s): C
  • Hardware(s): Arduino, Sensors

Xonix
Desktop Game, 2017

A single-player desktop video game where the player controls a small airplane, the job of which is to cut off and fill parts of a field. BGI and C language were used to develop it.

  • Language(s): C, BGI
